title: The One With The Ick Factor

questions.question: What does Rachel dream that she and Chandler are doing on the table at Central Perk?
questions.correct_answer: Doing it
questions.explanation: Rachel tells her friends about her dream, where she and Chandler are intimate on the table at Central Perk.

questions.question: Why does Phoebe want to operate a drill press?
questions.correct_answer: For a short-term job
questions.explanation: Phoebe tells her friends that she wants to operate a drill press for some short-term work until she gets back some of her massage clients.

questions.question: What is the reason for Ross's beeper going off?
options: For when Carol goes into labor
questions.correct_answer: For when Carol goes into labor
questions.explanation: Ross tells his friends that his beeper is for when Carol goes into labor, so he can be there for the birth of their baby.

questions.question: How old does Monica claim to be when she meets Young Ethan?
questions.explanation: Monica tells Young Ethan that she is 22 years old, although she is actually older.

questions.question: What is the job that Chandler's secretary is having done?
questions.correct_answer: A breast reduction
questions.explanation: Chandler tells his friends that his secretary is having one of her breasts reduced.

questions.question: What does Phoebe discover about the employees at Chandler's workplace?
options: They are all afraid of Chandler
They make fun of Chandler behind his back
questions.correct_answer: They make fun of Chandler behind his back
questions.explanation: Phoebe discovers that the employees at Chandler's workplace make fun of him behind his back, including doing impressions of him.

questions.question: What does Young Ethan reveal to Monica about his age?
questions.correct_answer: He is actually a senior in high school
questions.explanation: Young Ethan reveals to Monica that he is actually a senior in high school, not a senior in college as he had previously claimed.

questions.question: What is the reason for Monica breaking up with Young Ethan?
questions.correct_answer: Because he is too young
questions.explanation: Monica breaks up with Young Ethan because she feels that their relationship is 'icky' due to their significant age difference.

questions.question: What does Ross do when his beeper goes off and he thinks Carol is in labor?
options: He stays calm and calls the hospital
He panics and starts dancing on the coffee table
He ignores it and continues watching TV
questions.correct_answer: He panics and starts dancing on the coffee table
questions.explanation: Ross gets excited and starts dancing on the coffee table when his beeper goes off, thinking that Carol is in labor.

questions.question: What is the reason for Phoebe telling Chandler that his employees don't like him?
options: Because he is a bad boss
questions.correct_answer: Because he got promoted
questions.explanation: Phoebe tells Chandler that his employees don't like him because he got promoted and is now seen as 'Mr. Boss Man'.

questions.question: What does Phoebe suggest Chandler do to improve his relationship with his employees?
options: Fire them all and hire new employees
Attend a work party and hang out with them
questions.correct_answer: Attend a work party and hang out with them
questions.explanation: Phoebe suggests that Chandler attend a work party and hang out with his employees to show them that he is still a great guy.

questions.question: What does Ross do when he is waiting for the others to get ready to go to the hospital?
options: He stays calm and waits patiently
He gets anxious and starts pacing back and forth
questions.correct_answer: He gets anxious and starts pacing back and forth
questions.explanation: Ross gets anxious and starts pacing back and forth while waiting for the others to get ready to go to the hospital.

questions.question: What is the reason for Rachel bringing a mirror and lipstick to the hospital?
options: She wants to look nice for the doctors
She wants to take a selfie
She wants to put on makeup for a party
She wants to touch up her makeup
questions.correct_answer: She wants to look nice for the doctors
questions.explanation: Rachel brings a mirror and lipstick to the hospital because she wants to look nice for the doctors.

questions.question: What does Joey bring with him to the hospital?
questions.correct_answer: A sandwich
questions.explanation: Joey brings a huge sandwich with him to the hospital.

questions.question: What is Monica's reaction to becoming an aunt?
questions.correct_answer: She is excited and happy
questions.explanation: Monica is excited and happy about becoming an aunt, and is emotional about it.

questions.question: What does Chandler do when he finds out that his employees make fun of him?
options: He gets angry and yells at them
He ignores it and continues being a good boss
He tries to change his behavior to fit in with them
questions.correct_answer: He ignores it and continues being a good boss
questions.explanation: Chandler is aware that his employees make fun of him, but he tries to ignore it and continues being a good boss.

questions.question: What is the name of the phone number that Ross gives to people who call him by mistake?
questions.correct_answer: 55-JUMBO
questions.explanation: Ross tells people who call him by mistake that they want 55-JUMBO, not his number 55-JIMBO.

questions.question: What does Phoebe tell Chandler about his employees' impressions of him?
options: They think he is a great boss
They think he is a bad boss
They make fun of his jokes
questions.correct_answer: They do impressions of him
questions.explanation: Phoebe tells Chandler that his employees do impressions of him, including mimicking his voice and mannerisms.

questions.question: What is the reason for Ross's excitement when his beeper goes off?
options: He thinks Carol is in labor
He thinks it's a party invitation
He thinks it's a wrong number
questions.correct_answer: He thinks Carol is in labor
questions.explanation: Ross gets excited when his beeper goes off because he thinks Carol is in labor and he is going to be a father.

questions.question: What does Rachel do when Ross starts dancing on the coffee table?
options: She joins in and dances with him
She tries to calm him down
She laughs and takes a video
questions.correct_answer: She wakes up and talks to him
questions.explanation: Rachel wakes up and talks to Ross when he starts dancing on the coffee table.

questions.question: What is the name of the character who is having a baby?
questions.correct_answer: Carol
questions.explanation: Carol is the character who is having a baby.

questions.question: What does Chandler do when he overhears his employees making fun of him?
options: He confronts them and tells them to stop
He ignores them and continues working
He joins in and makes fun of himself
questions.correct_answer: He ignores them and continues working
questions.explanation: Chandler ignores his employees and continues working when he overhears them making fun of him.

questions.question: What is the reason for Monica's emotional state at the end of the episode?
options: She is excited about becoming an aunt
She is sad about her breakup with Young Ethan
She is nervous about meeting new people
She is happy about her new job
questions.correct_answer: She is sad about her breakup with Young Ethan
questions.explanation: Monica is emotional and sad about her breakup with Young Ethan.

questions.question: What does Ross do when he slips and falls on the floor?
options: He gets up and continues dancing
He stays on the floor and laughs
He gets hurt and needs help
He gets angry and yells at Rachel
questions.correct_answer: He gets hurt and needs help
questions.explanation: Ross gets hurt and needs help when he slips and falls on the floor.

questions.question: What is the final scene of the episode?
options: The gang waiting to go to the hospital
questions.correct_answer: The gang waiting to go to the hospital
questions.explanation: The final scene of the episode shows the gang waiting to go to the hospital.

questions.question: What is the reason for Phoebe's suggestion to Chandler to attend a work party?
options: So he can show off his dancing skills
So he can meet new people
So he can hang out with his employees and show them he is still a great guy
So he can give a speech
questions.correct_answer: So he can hang out with his employees and show them he is still a great guy
questions.explanation: Phoebe suggests that Chandler attend a work party so he can hang out with his employees and show them that he is still a great guy, despite being their boss.

questions.question: What does Joey ask Monica to ask Young Ethan?
options: Which Power Ranger is the strongest
questions.correct_answer: Which Power Ranger is the strongest
questions.explanation: Joey asks Monica to ask Young Ethan which Power Ranger is the strongest.

questions.question: What is the reason for Rachel's laughter when she is talking to Ross?
options: She is laughing at a joke
She is laughing at Ross's dancing
She is laughing at a memory
She is laughing at a dream she had
questions.correct_answer: She is laughing at a dream she had
questions.explanation: Rachel is laughing at a dream she had, which is revealed to be a intimate dream with Ross and Chandler.

questions.question: What does Phoebe tell Chandler about his employees' behavior towards him?
options: They are very respectful and professional
They make fun of him behind his back
They are very friendly and welcoming
questions.correct_answer: They make fun of him behind his back
questions.explanation: Phoebe tells Chandler that his employees make fun of him behind his back, including doing impressions of him.

questions.question: What is the reason for Monica's initial attraction to Young Ethan?
questions.correct_answer: His vulnerability and cuteness
questions.explanation: Monica is initially attracted to Young Ethan because of his vulnerability and cuteness, as well as his perceived youth and innocence.
